txt.en: You have defeated many Stone-trolls in the South Trollshaws.
Defeated Stone-trolls in the South Trollshaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
It is odd that Stone-trolls would risk the sunlight, as direct exposure would cause them to return to the stone from which they were made.
You should dispatch the Stone-trolls for their migration into the Trollshaws poses a danger to all who pass that way

Stone-trolls can be found north of the road, eastward from the Last Bridge and Barachen's camp.\n\nYou should dispatch the Stone-trolls which have come down from the mountains, for their migration into the Trollshaws poses a danger to all who pass that way.

Stone-trolls can be found north of the road, eastward from the Last Bridge and Barachen's camp.\n\nYou should dispatch the Stone-trolls which have come down from the mountains, for their migration into the Trollshaws poses a danger to all who pass that way.
'You have done us all a great service, [placeholder]. I hope that this disturbing new behaviour among the Stone-trolls has been brought to an end by your actions.'
You have defeated many Stone-trolls in the South Trollshaws

Barachen is at his camp south of the road that runs through the southern Trollshaws, on a sloping hill in the shadow of tall cliffs.\n\nBarachen will be pleased to know that you have defeated many Stone-trolls in the area.
'You should do something about the Stone-trolls, [placeholder], and you should do it at once!'
Defeat Stone-trolls in the South Trollshaws
'The Stone-trolls in the southern Trollshaws are formidable foes, but you and your allies must face them. Their unusual behaviour may have grim echoes if they are not dealt with at once.'

'There are stone-trolls throughout the southern Trollshaws, [placeholder], but I can tell you where you will almost certainly find them. To the east, the road dips southward for a short ways before curving north again. You will find stone-trolls among the trees within this bend, and north of the road.'
Defeat Stone-trolls in the South Trollshaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'The Stone-trolls are a real threat to travellers in the region.'
Completed
'You have been a great help to us, and for that you have my thanks.'
You have defeated many Stone-trolls in the South Trollshaws and have made the road safe for travel once more.
Very Unlike Trolls

Stone-trolls can be found north of the road, eastward from the Last Bridge and Barachen's camp.\n\nYou should dispatch the Stone-trolls which have come down from the mountains, for their migration into the Trollshaws poses a danger to all who pass that way.
